books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The second book in the Whistler series. Investigator Lacy Stoltz goes after a serial killer and closes in on a sitting judge.
books.name: THE JUDGE'S LIST

books.author: by Amor Towles
books.description: Two friends who escaped from a juvenile work farm take Emmett Watson on an unexpected journey to New York City in 1954.
books.name: THE LINCOLN HIGHWAY

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Maggie Dawes, a renowned travel photographer, struggles with a medical diagnosis over Christmas.
books.name: THE WISH

books.author: by Hillary Rodham Clinton and Louise Penny
books.description: In the wake of the previous administration’s mishandling of international affairs, the new Secretary of State Ellen Adams confronts interconnected global threats.
books.name: STATE OF TERROR

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Frank Herbert
books.description: The 1965 science fiction novel that is the basis of several adaptations, including the recent film directed by Denis Villeneuve.
books.name: DUNE

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: The Delaney siblings suspect their father of causing the disappearance of their mother.
books.name: APPLES NEVER FALL

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: A special letter to Santa brings about hope, love and second chances for Lindy Carmichael.
books.name: DEAR SANTA

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: An interconnected cast of dreamers and outsiders are in dangerous and disparate settings past, present and future.
books.name: CLOUD CUCKOO LAND

books.author: by Elizabeth Strout
books.description: Lucy Barton joins her ex-husband on a trip to look into a family secret.
books.name: OH WILLIAM!

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Laura Dave
books.description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.
books.name: THE LAST THING HE TOLD ME

books.author: by Ali Hazelwood
books.description: A young professor agrees to pretend to be a third-year Ph.D. candidate’s boyfriend.
books.name: THE LOVE HYPOTHESIS

books.author: by John Le Carré
books.description: A London spy chief’s investigation brings him to a quiet seaside town where Julian Lawndsley has relocated and opened a bookstore.
books.name: SILVERVIEW

books.author: by Jeffrey Archer
books.description: The fourth book in the William Warwick series. A detective and former undercover agent are at the center of three investigations.
books.name: OVER MY DEAD BODY
